
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/xiaoyan2017/p/19043040" title="发布于 2025-08-17 10:20">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">uniapp-vue3-table：基于uni-app+vue3跨端自定义表格table组件</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<p><span style="font-size: 18px; font-family: 宋体, &quot;Songti SC&quot;; color: rgba(51, 51, 153, 1)">最新研发<span style="background-color: rgba(255, 255, 0, 1)">uniapp+vue3</span>跨端自定义表格table组件|uni-app增强版table</span></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><strong>uni-vue3-table</strong>：基于<span style="background-color: rgba(204, 255, 255, 1)">uniapp+vue3</span>全端通用自定义<strong>加强版table</strong>组件。支持<span style="background-color: rgba(204, 255, 204, 1)">固定表头/列、边框、斑马纹、单选/多选，自定义表头/表体内容插槽、左右固定列阴影高亮</span>。支持编译运行<strong>web+小程序端+app端</strong>。</span></p>
<p><strong>编译运行到H5+小程序+App端。</strong></p>
<p><img alt="未标题-2" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817094104185-637499168.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><strong>uni-vue3-table表格组件<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">修复当列数过多，左右滚动会导致固定在左侧/右侧列也会随着一起滚动问题</span>。</strong></p>
<p><img alt="p2-1" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817094504047-247958856.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="p1" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817094518255-1650189269.gif" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>uniapp+vue3自定义表格</h3>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817094612150-2054493682.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px">将uv3-table组件放在components目录，在页面template中即可直接使用。</span></p>
<ul>
<li><strong>Props参数</strong></li>
</ul>
<p><img alt="image" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817095203903-420740136.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<ul>
<li><strong>columns列参数</strong></li>
</ul>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">/*</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*
 * 列参数
 * @params {string} background 对应列背景色
 * @params {string} type 对应列类型(多选selection 索引index)
 * @params {string} label 显示的列标题
 * @params {string} prop 对应的列字段名
 * @params {string} align 列水平对齐方式(left center right)
 * @params {number|string} width 对应列宽度
 * @params {boolean|string} fixed 该列固定到左侧(fixed:true|'left')或右侧(fixed:'right')
 * @params {string} columnStyle 对应列自定义样式
 * @params {string} className/class 表格列的类名className
 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">*/</span></pre>
</div>
<ul>
<li><strong>事件</strong></li>
</ul>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">@headerClick 点击表头
@rowClick    点击行触发
@select    多选/单选</span></pre>
</div>
<ul>
<li><strong>自定义插槽</strong></li>
</ul>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">headerCell 自定义表头内容
default 默认表体内容
empty 无数据插槽</span></pre>
</div>
<p><img alt="未标题-1" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817095837139-1369558612.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<h3>uni-vue3-table使用示例</h3>
<ul>
<li><strong>模拟数据</strong></li>
</ul>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>&lt;script setup&gt;<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
  import { ref } from </span>'vue'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">
  import Mock from </span>'mockjs'

  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 表格数据</span>
  const data =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ref(Mock.mock({
    total: </span>100<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    page: </span>1<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    pagesize: </span>10<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
    </span>'list|20'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">: [
      {
        id: </span>'@id()'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        author: </span>'@cname()'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        title: </span>'@ctitle(10, 50)'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        image: </span>'https://picsum.photos/400/400?random=' + '@guid()'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">switch</span>: '@boolean()'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        </span>'tags|1': ['admin', 'test', 'dev'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">],
        rate: </span>'@integer(1, 5)'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        date: </span>'@datetime()'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
        color: </span>'@color()'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">,
      }
    ]
  }))

  </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 表格列</span>
  const columns =<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> ref([
    {type: </span>'selection', align: 'center', width: 80, fixed: <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>}, <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 多选</span>
    {type: 'index', label: 'ID', align: 'center', width: 80, fixed: <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>}, <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 索引序号</span>
    {prop: 'author', label: '作者', align: 'center', width: 120<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
    {prop: </span>'title', label: '标题', align: 'left', width: '350px'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
    {prop: </span>'image', label: '图片', align: 'center', width: '120px'<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
    {prop: </span>'switch', label: '推荐', align: 'center', width: 100<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
    {prop: </span>'tags', label: '标签', align: 'center', width: 100<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
    {prop: </span>'rate', label: '评分', align: 'center', width: 200<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">},
    {prop: </span>'date', label: '发布时间', align: 'left', width: '250px'}, <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 时间</span>
    {prop: 'date', label: '更新时间', align: 'left', width: '250px'}, <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 时间</span>
    {prop: 'action', label: '操作', align: 'center', width: 150, fixed: 'right'}, <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">//</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 操作</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">  ])
</span>&lt;/script&gt;</pre>
</div>
<ul>
<li><strong>基本用法</strong></li>
</ul>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv3-table </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:columns</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="columns"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :dataSource</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="data.list"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span></pre>
</div>
<ul>
<li><strong>自定义表格条纹/颜色、高度</strong></li>
</ul>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv3-table
  </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:columns</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="columns"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  :dataSource</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="data.list"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  stripe
  stripeColor</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#eee"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  padding</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="5px"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  height</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="300px"</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span></pre>
</div>
<ul>
<li><strong>综合用法(固定左侧/右侧列、自定义表头/表体插槽、表格事件)</strong></li>
</ul>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv3-table
  </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:dataSource</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="data.list"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  :columns</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="columns"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  :headerBold</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="true"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  headerBackground</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#ecf5ff"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  stripe
  border
  padding</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="5px"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  maxHeight</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="500px"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  @rowClick</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleRowClick"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">
  @select</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleSelect"</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 自定义header插槽内容 </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
  <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">#headerCell</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="{ key, col, index }"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="key == 'title'"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
      <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">class</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="flex-c"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{col.label}} <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">input </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">placeholder</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="搜索"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">view</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-else-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="key == 'date'"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
      <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uni-icons </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">type</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="calendar"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uni-icons</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)"> {{col.label}}
    </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-else</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{col.label}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
  <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>

  <span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">&lt;!--</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)"> 自定义body插槽内容(由于小程序不支持动态:name插槽，通过key标识l来自定义表格内容) </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 128, 0, 1)">--&gt;</span>
  <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">#default</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="{ key, value, row, col, index }"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="key == 'image'"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
      <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-image </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:src</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="value"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> lazyLoad observeLazyLoad width</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="80rpx"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> height</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="80rpx"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="previewImage(value)"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-else-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="key == 'switch'"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
      <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">switch </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:checked</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="value"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> style</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="transform:scale(0.6);"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-else-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="key == 'tags'"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
      <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv-tags </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:text</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="value"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="row.color"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> :borderColor</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="row.color"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> plain size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="mini"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-else-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="key == 'rate'"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
      <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uni-rate </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">:value</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="value"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> size</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="14"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> readonly </span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-else-if</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="key == 'action'"</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
      <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uni-icons </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">type</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="compose"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#00aa7f"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleEdit(row)"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
      <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uni-icons </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">type</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="trash"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> color</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="#ff007f"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> style</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="margin-left: 5px;"</span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)"> @click</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">="handleDel(row)"</span> <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">/&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
    <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template </span><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">v-else</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>{{value}}<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
  <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">template</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span>
<span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&lt;/</span><span style="color: rgba(128, 0, 0, 1)">uv3-table</span><span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">&gt;</span></pre>
</div>
<p><img alt="360截图20250817064911265" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817100625624-532009660.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="003360截图20250816223247082" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817100645659-1333501361.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="004360截图20250816223412275" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817100656883-1355601003.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="006360截图20250816223905645" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817100725676-313142738.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="M003360截图20250816231328348" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817100802816-1517601891.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<p><img alt="App004360截图20250817000932130" loading="lazy" data-src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1289798/202508/1289798-20250817100819108-1920876965.png" class="lazyload"></p>
<blockquote>
<h3><em>uni-vue3-table表格组件已经更新到我的原创作品集。</em></h3>
<p><span style="font-size: 12px"><a href="https://mall.bilibili.com/neul-next/detailuniversal/detail.html?isMerchant=1&amp;page=detailuniversal_detail&amp;saleType=10&amp;itemsId=12933187&amp;loadingShow=1&amp;noTitleBar=1&amp;msource=merchant_share" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">uniapp+vue3跨端自定义table表格组件</a></span></p>
</blockquote>
<p>综上就uniapp+vue3自定义表格组件的一些知识分享，感谢大家的阅读与支持。</p>
<p><strong>附上几个最新项目实例</strong></p>
